alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 1:59PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby County through 230 PM CDT... At 158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Panama, or 6 miles northwest of Harlan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harlan around 210 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Irwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
